text: I didn't think you could improve on

tried this delicious blend it's whole
fruit orange juice it's so delicious all

two pounds of fruit so in this instance
I'm using a blend of navel orange one
grapefruit and one tangerine the juice
is so rich the body is just magnificent
it's almost like a smoothie but better
because it's just citrus this is exactly
what you want to be eating in these
cooler winter months often you'll find
with prepared orange juices there's a
little of this there's a little of that
in it and this has nothing except for
all the delicious vitamins and nutrients
now we're on to our Ruby grapefruit love
the Ruby's a little bit sweeter than the

sized pieces
so just help the blender this would be

all right that looks good sort of
